resources.string: NetGuard kullanarak, GNU Genel Kamu Lisansını sürüm 3 için kabul ediyorum

Great care has been taken to develop and test NetGuard, however it is impossible to guarantee it will work correctly on every device. NetGuard is known to crash when activated on some devices. It is also known to block all traffic on some other devices. These issues are caused by bugs in Android, or in the software provided by the manufacturer, so please don\'t blame NetGuard. \n\nBy using NetGuard, you agree to the GNU General Public License version 3
Show network speed graph in status bar notification
After disabling using the widget, automatically enable NetGuard again after the selected number of minutes\nEnter zero to disable this option
Apply Wi-Fi network rules for selected network only (apply mobile network rules for other Wi-Fi networks)
Apply mobile network rules to metered (paid, tethered) Wi-Fi networks
Apply Wi-Fi network rules for 2G data connections
Apply Wi-Fi network rules for 3G data connections
Apply Wi-Fi network rules for LTE data connections
Do not apply roaming rules when the SIM and mobile network country are the same
NetGuard devre dışı, NetGuard etkinleştirmek için yukarıdaki anahtarını kullanın.
NetGuard, büyük olasılıkla başka bir VPN tabanlı uygulama kullanılarak devre dışı bırakıldı

NetGuard uses a local VPN as a sinkhole to block internet traffic. For this reason, please allow a VPN connection in the next dialog. Since NetGuard has no internet permission, you know your internet traffic is not being sent anywhere.
Donations are completely voluntary and do not unlock any feature. Donations are meant as a way to show your appreciation for the work done.
Bağış yaparak şartlar & koşulları kabul etmiş sayılırsınız
If you cannot press OK in the next dialog, another (screen dimming) application is likely manipulating the screen.
Ekran açıkken Wİ-Fİ ye izin ver
